author: cms-ngt-hlt
body:
#### PR description

Introduce MET Validation at HLT, for Phase-2. The plots are added under ```DQMData/Run 1/HLT/Run summary/JetMET/JetValidation/```. The quantities being validated are standard kinematic variables plus the MET resolution, response and significance, considering ```hltPFMET```, ```hltPFPuppiMET``` and ```hltPFPuppiMETTypeOne```.

The PR logically follows #48722, and the plots will be produced using the same ```python``` tool.

#### PR validation

Currently being tested with:

```bash
NEVENTS=24

function mystep2() {
    cmsDriver.py step2 --step L1P2GT,HLT:@relvalRun4,VALIDATION:@hltValidation \
		 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T33 \
		 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW,DQMIO \
		 --procModifier ticl_v5 \
		 -n ${NEVENTS} \
		 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT,DQMIO \
		 --geometry ExtendedRun4D110 \
		 --era Phase2C17I13M9 \
		 --filein file:ff2fa095-6d70-4305-ae3e-3305a5c51099.root,file:e757f46c-a56d-4d30-9a65-9dff5f8c9810.root,file:e78bf7e3-2d98-4e1d-99f2-57ca8875ffd4.root,file:e7c1e015-808c-499b-935c-340bd323fba7.root,file:e7cd8930-8944-4b26-bc31-c11a46654623.root \
		 --fileout file:step2.root \
		 --nThreads 24 \
		 --process HLTX \
		 --inputCommands='keep *, drop *_hlt*_*_HLT, drop triggerTriggerFilterObjectWithRefs_l1t*_*_HLT'
}
    
function mystep3() {
    cmsDriver.py step3 \
		 -s HARVESTING:@hltValidation \
		 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T33 \
		 --procModifier ticl_v5 \
		 --mc \
		 --geometry ExtendedRun4D110 \
		 --scenario pp \
		 --filetype DQM \
		 --era Phase2C17I13M9 \
		 -n -1  \
		 --process HLTX \
		 --filein file:step2_inDQM.root \
		 --fileout file:step3.root
}

mystep2 && mystep3
```

where the files correspond to 200PU QCD RelVal samples produced under ```CMSSW_15_1_0_pre4```.
title: Met Validation for Phase-2 HLT
